moves.1... e5: Black responds with a classical opening, I prefer a modern opening: The Sicilian Defense, but to each his own.
moves.2. Nf3 f6: ?!?!?!?!?!?!  A awful move that not only fails to protect the e5 pawn (See next move) but does not develop any pieces either.
moves.3. Nxe5: ! A trick opening that leads to no disadvantages for White.  If Black recaptures than White goes on a forceful attack ...fxe5? 4. Qh5+!, Ke7 (...g6 leads to the capture of Black's Rook) 5. Qxe5+, Kf7 6. Bc4+, d5 (...Kg6 leads to 7. Qf5+, Kh6 8. d4+, g5 9. h4, no move can save black now... 10. hxg5+, Kg7 11. Qf7#) back to the main line 7. Bxd5+, Kg6 8. Bxb7!, (Black cannot take back because it is protecting the f5 square and white wins blacks rook.  That was a long-winded way of saying that 2 ..., f6?? is a terrible move and fxe5??????? is a worse one.
moves.3... d6: A OK move, but now the dark square bishop is trapped
moves.4. Nf3: "Not aggressive but fundamentally sound" is what someone may say, but they're wrong.  4. Qh5+! leads to a rook capture.
moves.4... c6: ? Black removes the best square for his knight and does not accomplish much
moves.5. d3: A bad move by me for obvious reasons, 5. d4 is better.
moves.5... d5: Black has not moved a non-pawn piece, he will quickly fall behind in development and center control.
moves.6. exd5: The flaws of 5. d3 are becoming well known.
moves.6... cxd5: Blacks knight has his square back
moves.7. Nc3: White establishes better center control and a development lead.
moves.8. d4: This should have been played immediately at move 5.
moves.8... f5: I don't get this move, it grabs little center and nothing else.
moves.9. Bb5: 3 to 1 in development, and Black's only developed piece is pinned.
moves.10... Nf6: One in a bunch of possible moves
moves.12. Ne5+: Capitalizes on the center and development advantage
moves.12... Kd6 13. Bf4: What terrible mockery of chess is this? A Queen, King, Rook fork is on the table!!!  Nf7+ looks like the best move by far.  But Black has no defense to Bf4.
moves.14. Nxc6+: One would expect Nf7++ but Nxc6+ leads to mate
